description:
Brooklyn Heights is a charming neighborhood and it's very close to the city. You have access to the following subway lines: R, 2/3, 4/5. This apartment is a spacious studio with lots of natural light and modern appliances.

This is a very popular neighborhood because it is central to so much - Manhattan, Barclays and Prospect Park.

You have access to the washer and drier in our sister building.

I will be easily accessible via email and/or text.

I love how accessible it is to many great restaurants, bars, grocery stores and subway lines.

Yes - R, 2/3 and 4/5 are all less than a 10-minute walk.

Please feel free to ask any questions.
name: Sunny and Spacious Modern BK Heights Studio
review: Excellent location. Beautiful, quiet street & building. Warm, lovely apartment with gorgeous natural light. Fantastic kitchen. Home away from home. Would stay here again in a heartbeat. Wonderful base for exploring the whole city, easy walking to heart of Brooklyn. Ayesha highly responsive, attentive host.
